Bosses.Name: Minduruva
Bosses.Strategy: After displaying her mechanics this boss will mark areas in the arena from which her further mechanics will go off.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Bio
Mechanics.Description: Tankbuster and damage over time. Can be dispelled with Esuna.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Blizzard III
Mechanics.Description: Fires twelve thin, equally spaced cone AoEs into all directions. Stand inbetween them.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Thunder III
Mechanics.Description: Small traveling circle AoEs that travel outwards in a cross shape from their origin point.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Bio III
Mechanics.Description: A large AoE that covers the entire area in front of the boss, or the target area facing the middle of the room.

Mechanics.Name: Dhrupad
Mechanics.Description: Damage over time effect on all non-tanks.

Bosses.Name: Sanduruva
Bosses.Strategy: Avoid AoEs as possible. When the boss casts Manusya Stop, spread out around her because each player will be unable to move while she casts her AoE. When she summons her mirror images run to the one that isn't moving at all.

Mechanics.Name: Prapti Siddhi
Mechanics.Description: Line AoE at every player one by one.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Berserk
Mechanics.Description: Five orbs appear and explode in AoEs afterwards. Getting hit inflicts the Berserk debuff, which causes the player to uncontrollably run towards the boss and attack her.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Stop
Mechanics.Description: Inflicts a debuff on each player that causes stop once it runs out. The boss will cast an unavoidable Prapti Siddhi at each player as their debuffs run out.

Mechanics.Name: Manusya Confuse
Mechanics.Description: Boss leaps away and lands around the room with five mirror images. Only the one that isn't moving is the boss. The others are Manusya Berserk orbs disguised as the boss.

Bosses.Name: The Magus Sisters
Bosses.Strategy: Kill Cinduruva first, as she can revive her sisters. The boss alternates between Delta Attack, which makes Minduruva's mechanics going off from all 3 sisters in a slightly altered version and the 3 sisters casting some of her base mechanics individually.

Mechanics.Name: Delta Attack
Mechanics.Description:
This is a multi-layered mechanic that consists of Minduruva casting one of her spells, Sanduruva casting Manusya Faith which buffs and slightly alters Minduruva's spell, and Cinduruva using Manusya Reflect so Minduruva's spell goes off from all three sisters' hitboxes.

Minduruva's spells are indicated by a text bos that appears on screen:

Blizzard III = Glacial ice, entomb our foes!
Thunder II = Thunderous tempest, smite our foes!
Fire III = Insatiable flame, consume our foes!
